page.title: 05Buntingford Markets
page.content:
Monday Market This was restarted in 1983, after a lapse of many years.It is a small market, selling such things as cards,earrings,toys,pens,handbags,groc eries,fish etc.
May Day Market This raises money for various charities.It is held annually,on the first Monday in May.Many clubs hire stalls and sell produce for their own charities.There is sometimes music and country dancing.
School Fairs In common with other schools, Millfield and Edwinstree hold fairs run by teachers and parents.The Millfield fair opens with races, while Edwinstree runs a 5-a-side competition.
